items.sentence: The workmen stopped working and just stared at us.
I'm sure that the traffic noise will irritate Tom.
Tom told the police he'd been mugged by three men.
I don't think that what you did would impress Tom.
Tom saw a man in his backyard that he didn't know.
We can talk about whatever you want to talk about.
How can I get my dog to stop barking all the time?
Do you think Tom and Mary have both put on weight?
Tom was a better singer than Mary thought he'd be.
The sheriff told Tom to be out of town by sundown.
